name: General Carlist Rieekan
Lore: 'One of the original founders of the Rebel Alliance. Former civilian strategist with the House of Organa. Somber leader of Echo Base.',
Text: 'Each Rebel present with him at a Hoth site is power +1. May use 1 Force to cancel Death Squadron. While at an Echo site, opponent must occupy an additional Hoth site to cancel Echo Base Operations.',
